item.title: 法国政府提出收购阿托斯前高级计算部门的部分股权
item.description: 阿托斯公司周一表示，法国政府已提出 4.1 亿欧元（4.6633 亿美元）的确认收购要约，以收购技术公司阿托斯前高级计算业务的一部分。【原文：The French state has made a 410 million euros ($466.33 million)confirmatory offer to buy part of the former Advanced Computing business of tech company Atos , said Atos on Monday.】

item.title: 迪奥任命乔纳森-安德森为女装和高级定制时装设计总监
item.description: 路威酩轩集团（LVMH）旗下的迪奥（Dior）周一表示，迪奥将任命其男装设计师乔纳森-安德森（Jonathan Anderson）兼任女装设计和高级定制时装的负责人，接替玛丽亚-格拉兹亚-奇乌里（Maria Grazia Chiuri），并扩大他的职责范围，以重振销售业绩。【原文：Dior is appointing its menswear designer Jonathan Anderson to also head womenswear designs and haute couture, replacing Maria Grazia Chiuri and widening his role as it seeks to reignite sales, the LVMH-owned label said on Monday.】

item.title: Flyadeal 航空公司首席执行官抨击空客 "不可原谅 "的交货延误
item.description: 沙特廉价航空公司 flyadeal 的负责人批评了空中客车公司对窄体飞机延误的处理方式，并表示担心中断可能会波及新订购的宽体 A330neos。【原文：The head of Saudi budget carrier flyadeal criticised Airbus' handling of delays of narrow-body jets and voiced concerns that disruption could spread to freshly ordered wide-body A330neos.】

item.title: 赛诺菲以 91 亿美元收购美国生物制药集团 Blueprint
item.description: 法国制药集团赛诺菲和美国蓝图医药公司周一表示，两家公司已同意收购一家专门从事系统性肥大细胞增多症（一种罕见的免疫性疾病）研究的生物制药公司。【原文：French pharma group Sanofi has agreed to buy US-based Blueprint Medicines Corporation , a biopharmaceutical company specializing in systemic mastocytosis, a rare immunological disease, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，迪奥选中乔纳森-安德森（Jonathan Anderson）担任创意总监
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周一报道，北爱尔兰设计师乔纳森-安德森（Jonathan Anderson）被任命为迪奥（Dior）女装、男装和高级定制时装系列的创意总监，接替担任这一职位近十年的玛丽亚-格拉西亚-乔里（Maria Grazia Chiuri）。【原文：Northern Irish designer Jonathan Anderson has been named creative director of women’s, men’s and haute couture collections of Dior, replacing Maria Grazia Chiuri who held the role for almost a decade, the Financial Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 汇丰银行将向其私人信贷基金注资 40 亿美元
item.description: 欧洲最大的银行汇丰银行（HSBC）将向其私人信贷基金注资 40 亿美元，在传统借贷利润面临压力的情况下，银行正更广泛地进军这一蓬勃发展的市场。【原文：Europe's biggest bank HSBC will inject $4 billion into its private credit funds, amid a wider push by banks into the booming market as profits from traditional lending have come under pressure.】

item.title: 航空公司对全球贸易规则的削弱提出警告
item.description: 全球航空业机构负责人周一警告说，日益增长的贸易壁垒将对经济和航空旅游业造成损害。【原文：The head of a global airlines industry body warned on Monday of damage to the economy and the air travel sector from growing trade barriers.】

item.title: 欧洲 关税情节曲折失去吸引力
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 全球航空公司因贸易紧张局势和供应困境下调 2025 年利润预期
item.description: 全球航空公司周一下调了对2025年全行业利润的关键预测，将原因归咎于贸易紧张局势和消费者信心下降，同时抨击喷气式客机交付的 "不可接受 "延误阻碍了他们的增长计划。【原文：Global airlines shaved a key forecast for 2025 industry-wide profits on Monday, blaming trade tensions and declining consumer confidence, while hitting out at "unacceptable" delays in jetliner deliveries that have hindered their growth plans.】

item.title: 精明行事：向欧洲央行提出的五个问题
item.description: 欧洲央行预计将于周四降息，这将是其在本轮降息周期中的第八次降息，交易员们认为，随着经济状况好于预期，长期通胀忧虑逐渐回升，降息将随之暂停。【原文：The European Central Bank is tipped to cut interest rates on Thursday, its eighth move this cycle, with traders sensing a pause will then follow as the economy holds up better than anticipated and longer-term inflation worries creep back.】

item.title: 中国拒绝接受特朗普关于中国违反日内瓦贸易协定的指责
item.description: 中国周一表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普指责北京违反了日内瓦贸易谈判达成的共识是 "毫无根据的"，并承诺将采取有力措施维护自身利益。【原文：China said on Monday that U.S. President Donald Trump's accusations that Beijing had violated the consensus reached in Geneva trade talks were "groundless", and promised to take forceful measures to safeguard its interests.】

item.title: 花旗任命美国银行资深人士张晓东为新任中国区主管
item.description: 花旗集团周一表示，已任命张文杰（Wenjie Zhang）为新的国家官员兼中国区银行业务负责人，此前花旗集团前中国区负责人已于 11 月离职。【原文：Citigroup said on Monday it had appointed Wenjie Zhang as its new country officer and banking head for China, after the exit of its former China head in November.】

item.title: 对冲基金在 Sohn Hong Kong 首选中国机器人和印度制药公司
item.description: 在香港举行的 Sohn 年度投资会议上，对冲基金披露了他们的顶级投资理念，从中国的自动驾驶出租车、印度的药品零售商到韩国的核电站建设者，不一而足。【原文：Hedge funds revealed their top investment ideas, ranging from Chinese self-driving taxis, an Indian drug retailer, to a Korean nuclear plant builder, at the annual Sohn investment conference in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 受特朗普计划将钢铁进口关税提高一倍的影响，澳大利亚博思格公司业绩大涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示计划将进口钢铁关税提高一倍后，澳大利亚钢铁生产商博思格钢铁公司（BlueScope Steel）的股价周一跳涨至三个多月来的新高。【原文：Shares of Australian steel producer BlueScope Steel jumped on Monday to a more than three-month high after U.S. President Donald Trump said he planned to double tariffs on imported steel.】

item.title: 受美国关税影响，5月份亚洲工厂活动萎缩
item.description: 周一的民间调查显示，由于中国需求疲软和美国关税的影响给企业造成了严重损失，亚洲的工厂活动在5月份出现萎缩，凸显出这个曾经快速增长的地区前景暗淡。【原文：Asia's factory activity shrank in May as soft demand in China and the impact of U.S. tariffs took a heavy toll on companies, private surveys showed on Monday, highlighting the darkening outlook for the once fast-growing region.】

item.title: 澳新银行-Indeed数据显示，澳大利亚5月份招聘广告连续第二个月下降
item.description: 5 月份，澳大利亚的招聘广告连续第二个月下降，这表明劳动力市场的紧张状况可能正在慢慢缓解，尽管招聘广告的数量仍然远远高于大流行前的水平。【原文：Australian job advertisements fell for a second successive month in May in a sign that the tight labour market may be slowly easing, though the number remained well above pre-pandemic levels.】

item.title: 韩国钢铁部表示将尽量减少钢铁产品 50%关税的影响
item.description: 韩国工业部周一表示，作为与华盛顿贸易谈判的一部分，韩国将应对美国即将对钢铁产品征收的50%关税，以尽量减少对工业的影响。【原文：South Korea's Industry Ministry said on Monday it will respond to the looming 50% U.S. tariff on steel products as part of its trade discussions with Washington in order to minimise the impact on industry.】

item.title: 交易员评估关税前景，美元下跌
item.description: 美元周一走低，回吐了上周的部分涨幅，原因是市场权衡了唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策前景及其限制经济增长和引发通胀的可能性。【原文：The U.S. dollar edged lower on Monday, giving back some of its gains from last week, as markets weighed the outlook for President Donald Trump's tariff policy and its potential to constrict growth and unleash inflation.】

item.title: 高盛认为欧佩克+8 月石油产量将增加 41 万桶/天
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）在周日的一份报告中称，预计欧佩克+八国石油集团将在 8 月份最终增产 41 万桶/日。【原文：Goldman Sachs anticipates the eight country OPEC+ oil group will implement a final 0.41 million barrels per day (mb/d) production increase in August, the bank said in a note dated Sunday.】

item.title: 韩国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，韩国工厂活动再次萎缩，新订单出现五年来最大幅度下滑
item.description: 周一的一项商业调查显示，由于国内需求疲软和美国关税的影响给工厂产出造成严重损失，韩国工厂活动在5月份连续第四个月萎缩，同时整体订单以五年来最大的速度急剧下降。【原文：South Korea's factory activity shrank for a fourth month in May as frail domestic demand and the impact of U.S. tariffs took a heavy toll on factory output while overall orders plunged at their steepest pace in five years, a business survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市和美元对关税消息持谨慎态度
item.description: 本周一，亚洲股市开局谨慎，投资者在白宫关税政策的风云变幻中徘徊，同时等待着关键的美国就业数据和普遍预期的欧洲降息。【原文：Asian share markets made a wary start to the week on Monday as investors navigated the shifting sands of White House tariff policy, while awaiting key U.S. jobs data and a widely expected cut in European interest rates.】

item.title: 日本一季度资本支出创纪录，但部分出口行业疲软
item.description: 在以内需为主的行业带动下，日本企业第一季度对工厂和设备的投资激增至创纪录水平，但主要出口行业却减少了支出，这表明美国关税正在削弱企业信心。【原文：Investment by Japanese companies in plants and equipment surged to a record in the first quarter led by industries focused on domestic demand, but key export sectors reduced spending in a sign that U.S. tariffs are undermining business confidence.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔仍对今年晚些时候降息持开放态度
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）周日表示，尽管特朗普政府的关税制度可能会暂时推高物价压力，但今年晚些时候仍有可能降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said Sunday that interest rate cuts remain possible later this year even as the Trump administration’s tariff regime is likely to push up price pressures temporarily.】

item.title: 降息预期提振澳大利亚 5 月房价
item.description: 由于对更多降息的预期提振了购房者的情绪，澳大利亚 5 月份的房价连续第四个月上涨，各州首府的房价均有所上涨。【原文：Australia's house prices rose for the fourth straight month in May as expectations of more interest rate cuts boosted buyer sentiment, with every state capital posting a rise in prices.】

item.title: 欧佩克+坚持 7 月产量增幅与 6 月持平，石油反弹
item.description: 欧佩克+决定 7 月份增产幅度与前两个月相同，符合市场预期，油价在周一亚洲早盘反弹超过每桶 1 美元。【原文：Oil prices rebounded more than $1 a barrel in early Asian trade on Monday after OPEC+ decided to increase output in July by the same amount as it did in each of the prior two months, in line with market expectation.】

item.title: KKR 提高对德国 IT 服务公司 Datagroup 的有条件收购要约
item.description: 法兰克福上市的 IT 服务提供商 Datagroup SE 周日表示，KKR 已提出有条件的建议，将潜在的收购报价提高到每股 58 欧元（65.84 美元）。【原文：Frankfurt-listed IT services provider Datagroup SE said on Sunday that KKR has made a conditional proposal to increase the potential acquisition offer to up to 58 euros ($65.84) per share.】

item.title: 卢特尼克淡化关税法庭裁决对美国与欧盟谈判的影响
item.description: 商务部长说，这一裁决 "可能让我们损失了一周的时间，但随后每个人都回到了谈判桌前"。【原文：The ruling "maybe cost us a week, but then everybody came right back to the table," the commerce secretary said.】

item.title: 台湾央行称美债 "稳健"，不担心美元的储备作用
item.description: 台湾中央银行周日表示，美国政府债务 "稳健"，仍受投资者青睐，美元作为主要国际储备货币的地位也无后顾之忧。【原文：Taiwan's central bank said on Sunday that U.S. government debt is "sound" and still favoured by investors, and there are no worries about the U.S. dollar's position as the leading international reserve currency.】

item.title: 国际航空运输协会预计 2025 年可持续航空燃料产量将翻一番
item.description: 国际航空运输协会周日表示，预计到 2025 年，可持续航空燃料的生产量将翻一番，达到 200 万吨，占航空公司燃料消耗量的 0.7%。【原文：The International Air Transport Association said on Sunday it expects the amount of sustainable aviation fuel produced to double in 2025 to reach 2 million tonnes, representing 0.7% of airlines' fuel consumption.】

item.title: 研究发现，使用阿斯利康药片进行血液检测指导治疗可降低乳腺癌恶化风险
item.description: 癌症专家周日表示，在乳腺癌患者出现对标准疗法耐药的第一个迹象时，就用阿斯利康公司的实验性药片卡米雌酯（camizestrant）进行治疗，可将疾病进展或死亡的风险降低一半，这一发现可能会改变此类癌症的治疗方式。【原文：Treating breast cancer patients with AstraZeneca's experimental pill camizestrant at the first sign of resistance to standard treatments cut the risk of disease progression or death by half, a finding that could change the way such cancers are treated, cancer experts said on Sunday.】
